description:
This career development course will teach you how to effectively communicate, collaborate, and resolve conflicts with colleagues and become a stellar team member. You’ll learn through real-world examples and scenarios, which will enable you to be ready to collaborate on day one of your next job or project. 

This is the second course in the five-part Career Edge Fullbridge XSeries, designed to prepare you for career success.
title: Career2x: Career Edge: Communication and Teamwork
